ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well personally I d stay in Nro doing dervs paticular camp 3 since more thugs spawn there until 16. Once you hit 16 head for Lake R and do Aviaks. Naeeldar
ygData.messageBody:
Well personally I'd stay in Nro doing dervs paticular camp 3 since more
thugs spawn there until 16. Once you hit 16 head for Lake R and do Aviaks.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the almost 40th Circle
-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... <Aazen1@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, October 16, 1999 11:55 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Where to hunt?


>From: Aazen1@...
>
>Hi, I am a level 15 DE Necro and I was wondering if anyone had any
>suggestions as to where I could hunt?I am currently doing Dervs in NRo, but
>even if I have the entire Dorn camp to myself, the experience isn't that
>good(great loot though) cause they all con blue or green.I was wondering if
>anyone could recommend anywhere else to hunt?Also, could anyone recommend
>anywhere to hunt at lvl 16 as well?It'll soon come and I would like to
>already have an idea of where I want to go-besides crocs and camains(sp) in
>Oasis.
>
>Thanks in advance!
>Aazen, lvl 15(soon to be 16) DE Necromancer
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
